Bill&Charlie's 11470 Bellingrath Rd , Theodore AL 36582-8409 map 0 Recommendations Bar on Bellingrath road approximately 6 1/2 miles from Hwy 90.
The old "Bama Barn" We have 8 pool tables, electronic darts, Silver Strike Bowling and LIVE MUSIC every weekend. We are starting a 12 week KAROKE CONTEST on Thursdays ($600 finals payout..plus weekly prizes to the winner). Additional Info: We have a great staff here and promise to do everything to make sure YOU have a GREAT time!!!
